content: crochet pattern switch to red yarn row 25 2 half_double_crochet in first stitch half_double_crochet in each stitch until two stitches remain chain 2 turn 28 stitches switch to white yarn row 26 - hdc2tog half_double_crochet in each stitch across until one stitch remains 2 half_double_crochet chain 2 turn 28 stitches row 27 2 half_double_crochet in first stitch half_double_crochet in each stitch until two stitches remain chain 2 turn 28 stitches row 28 - hdc2tog half_double_crochet in each stitch across until one stitch remains 2 half_double_crochet chain 2 turn 28 stitches you will repeat row 15 through 28 - the pattern of 7 row of red 3 row of white 1 row of red 3 row of white - until you reach your desired length i did 8 repeats for a total of 112 row with a final length of 59 inches 150 cm and width of 7 inches 18 cm weave in ends with yarn needle you re done hope you enjoyed this pattern please let me know if you have any questions or find any errors in the pattern at urbandabbler@gmail com you can also find me on ravelry under username urbandabbler thanks 5
